awidhimath aarthika kshetha්raya pilibanda kanthawange nipunatha wardhanaya sandaha ka්ramanukula puhunu kirim ka්riyawaliyak ha nawina thakshanika danuma labadimata kusalatha sanwardhana saha wruththiya puhunu amathyanshaya, jathika pa්rathipaththi ha aarthika katayuthu amathyanshaya, pa්rathamika karmantha amathyanshaya, ga්ramiya aarthika katayuthu amathyanshaya, krushikarma amathyanshaya, kamkaru amathyanshaya saha siyaluma palath sabha hi ga්ramiya sanwardhana thakshanika, aarthika sanwardhana ha kantha katayuthu amathyansha piyawara gatha yuthuya.
